title: Ive Beed Hacked
body: Hello my lol account has been hacked i cant get a email sent to my gmail i was wondering if a high end support could contact me about getting my account back or all the RP on a new account although i would love my old account more. I think that they have changed the password.I cannot log in ive been trying for ages now and im starting to give up i love league and would love to get my account back.I also cant log on to the mobile app and league site i made a new account just to post this my real league name is FluidSea Please contact soon <3 FluidSea. My account is lvl 30 and i am unranked atm

replies.body: We can look into this and help!  If you don't have access to the registered email, just reach out to us with an[ account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  A specialist form the account team will review your situation and assist.  In the meantime, I suggest going over the [account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide, to make sure you're secured in and outside of league.  We'll reply back asap!

Thank you i have filled in the forum but im just wondering how will i get the reply to my report and will you be able to get my account back?
<3
